content.description: On the furthest left side of the boulder when looking at the roof. Starts matched with an under cling in a pocket under the main groove seam. Burl up to get into position, make a big move up and right and get really smitten.
content.location: On the furthest left side of the boulder when looking at the roof.

content.description: Named after the start hold that resembled a cat but has lived its nine lives and is now a prominent prow located under the nostril like holds in the roof. Start matched on the prow and use the pinches and pockets to work your way into the main groove seam up and left. Hike up a right foot and keep the kitten mittens on full blast for the mantle.
content.location: The prominent prow located under the nostril like holds in the roof.

content.description: Look for the highest point of the boulder. This climb starts on some prominent hold under the pebble band. Move straight up with some good slopers and rock over a right heel for the mantle.
content.location: Look for the highest point of the boulder.

content.description: Iron features and slopey slopers. This boulder is down the hill from and to the right. Look for the wave like roof withcool pinches, seams, pockets, and slopers.
